title: 820-2915 restart attempting Gpu switch
message: I have a MacBook Pro 15 2011 that restart itself every time it try to switch between two Gpu. I have already replaced C9560 and reflowed mux u9600.

title: 820-2915 restart attempting Gpu switch
message: The usual bad GPU again. Again, C9560 is ONLY on 2850 boards.
